attributes.action: abandon plans to introduce 'stop and question' powers for the police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We understand that the police have a difficult job, but we also believe that "reasonable suspicion" of a criminal act (which the law currently allows), is sufficient for the purposes of crime prevention.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
